note: Writer and software engineer, interested in how tech can help creators rather than replace them. Editor/publisher of horror e-zine tiny frights (tinyfrights.com). Tech guy for Riverfront Readings (RiverfrontReadings.com). Extreme bookworm. Extremely liberal. He/him. Avatar: a white guy with glasses and wavy but receding hair, in graphic novel format. Header: the interior of an old-fashioned car with a coffeepot and coffee cup to the right of the steering wheel.
